name: showstopper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece in a stage performance that the audience enjoy so much that their clapping and shouts of approval interrupt the performance
something that is very impressive: That dress she wore was a showstopper!
something that prevents an activity or process from continuing: It's something to be aware of and for us to work through, but I don't think it's a showstopper.
